content: what you need for this pattern materials yarn - heartland from lionbrand yarn 1 skein = 251yd/230m 5oz/142g 4 medium/worsted colour a- grand canyon colour b - sequoia hooks - 6mm / j-10 scissors yarn needle stitch markers numbers of skeins for each size approx colour a - 3 3 4 4 5 5 6 6 7 colour b - approx 15 g for all sizes gauge 12sts x 9rows = 4 x 4 10cm x 10cm final measurements for this cardigan for all sizes in inches bust only the main panel without ribbing 36 40 44 48 52 56 60 64 68 length 32 for all sizes arm depth 7 75 8 25 8 75 9 25 9 75 10 25 10 75 11 25 11 75
